Title: Vanport, 1965
Location:
Portland State University
Smith Memorial Student Union
Notes:
Funded by CETA (the Comprehensive Employment and Training Act of 1973), this mural was displayed on the exterior walls of the Albina Human Resource Center in North Portland’s Albina neighborhood from 1978 to 1983.
Shamsud-Din’s mural was then relocated to PSU.
